title: RELATING TO WORKFORCE DEVELOPMENT.
subject: Applications
Appropriation ($)
DLIR
Department of Human Resources Development
Eligibility
Judiciary
Legislature
State Agencies
State Internship and Workforce Development Program

abstracts.abstract: Amends the State Internship and Workforce Development Program for the public sector by expanding the program to the Legislative and Judicial branches; limiting the internships to full-time placements of ten to eleven months; establishing eligibility criteria, application requirements, and selection preferences; and requiring the Department of Labor and Industrial Relations to collaborate with coordinating agencies to promote the program and recruit eligible applicants.  Appropriates funds.
